statements: UPDATE athlete_nutrition_plan SET dietary_preferences='Vegan', intake_habits='Three meals a day' WHERE athlete_id=1;
UPDATE athlete_nutrition_plan SET intake_habits='Five smaller meals a day', dietary_preferences='Low carb' WHERE athlete_id=2;
UPDATE athlete_nutrition_plan SET dietary_preferences = 'Low Carb', intake_habits = 'High protein intake' WHERE athlete_id = 1;
UPDATE athlete_nutrition_plan SET intake_habits = 'Vegan diet', dietary_preferences = 'Vegetarian' WHERE athlete_id = 2;
UPDATE athlete_nutrition_plans SET protein_intake = 120, carb_intake = 150, fat_intake = 50 WHERE athlete_id = 1;
UPDATE athlete_nutrition_plans SET carb_intake = 100, protein_intake = 110, fat_intake = 40 WHERE athlete_id = 2;
UPDATE athlete_nutrition_plans SET protein_ratio = 0.4, carb_ratio = 0.4, fat_ratio = 0.2 WHERE athlete_id = 1;
UPDATE athlete_nutrition_plans SET total_calories = 2500, meal_frequency = 6 WHERE athlete_id = 2;
UPDATE athlete_nutrition_plans SET protein_goal = 120, carb_goal = 150 WHERE athlete_id = 1;
UPDATE intake_habits SET meal_time = '12:30:00', calories_consumed = 600 WHERE athlete_id = 2;
UPDATE athlete_nutrition_plans SET protein_goal=120, carb_goal=150 WHERE athlete_id=1;
UPDATE dietary_preferences SET preference_description='Low sugar and gluten-free' WHERE athlete_id=3;
UPDATE athlete_information SET age = 25 WHERE athlete_id = 1;
UPDATE dietary_preferences SET is_vegan = true, is_diabetic_friendly = false WHERE preference_id = 3;
UPDATE athlete_information SET height = 180.5, weight = 75.3 WHERE athlete_id = 123;
UPDATE dietary_preferences SET is_vegan = TRUE, is_gluten_free = FALSE WHERE preference_id = 456;
UPDATE athlete SET age = 28 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE intake_habits SET calories_consumed = 2000, protein_consumed = 100, carb_consumed = 300, fat_consumed = 50 WHERE athlete_id = 2 AND date = '2022-07-15';
UPDATE athlete SET age = 28, height = 180.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE intake_habits SET calories_consumed = 2500, protein_consumed = 120, fat_consumed = 80 WHERE athlete_id = 3 AND date = '2023-05-15';
